#Get-SPOWeb
*Topic automatically generated on: 2015-06-03*

Returns the current web object
##Syntax
```powershell
Get-SPOWeb [-Identity <WebPipeBind>]
```


##Parameters
Parameter|Type|Required|Description
---------|----|--------|-----------
|Identity|WebPipeBind|False||
